detailsData.title: Creative, Practical Solutions
detailsData.content: Peters Hamlin Law, LLC distinguishes itself from other law firms through its unique approach to solving legal problems. The practice of law is strategic, cost-effective and individually tailored to every client's needs.

detailsData.title: Proven Experience
detailsData.content: Kristan Peters-Hamlin has served as Assistant U.S. Attorney in Washington, D.C. and litigated on behalf of Fortune 500 clients in 30 states. She brings over 33 years of experience and has tried dozens of cases to verdict.

detailsData.title: Award-Winning Lawyer
detailsData.content: Kristan Peters-Hamlin has been repeatedly selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers and awarded for high verdicts. She was recognized by TopVerdict.com for winning one of the Top 20 Verdicts of the year in Connecticut.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: Every client works directly with a Connecticut employment lawyer who has been repeatedly selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers. The goal is to solve your legal problem whether inside or outside the courtroom.

valueProp: Peters Hamlin Law, LLC is a litigation boutique, focusing its practice on employment law, severance negotiations, whistleblower suits, wrongful termination suits, Dodd Frank and Sarbanes-Oxley lawsuits, fraud and white collar criminal litigation, executive compensation, retaliation, discrimination, labor union disputes, trade secret disputes, qui tam cases, and complex civil litigation. Peters Hamlin Law, LLC distinguishes itself from other law firms through its unique approach to solving legal problems. At Peters Hamlin Law, LLC, the practice of law is strategic, cost-effective and individually tailored to every client's needs.
